answers.author: Patricia Greene
answers.text:
I am a candidate for executive management and have responded to several city manager positions.  In this capacity, I have been in contact with several search firms and have formed varying opinions that I would like to share with you offline. In the past I too have done some executive recruitment in the private sector.  If you think this kind of  feedback is important, please contact me at villages4u@yahoo.com

answers.text:
Another source for identifying firms is the jobs section of ICMA website.  Many of the city manager positions posted there are being handled by search firms and their contact information is posted there as well.  Hope this helps.
